data.name: Paint Warfare - Captain Bananas Supporter Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Equip this to look totally snazzy + support the development costs of Paint Warfare!

Includes:
  • A huge banana costume + sunglasses (customisable w/ your own hats!)
  • Bunnings hat
  • Doubles XP (ranking) for everyone including you in your lobby
  • 2 supporter player tags— Heart (❤) & Tester (テスタ)
  • Unique gun stickers for the Snake/AK, Frenzy and Sniper

  • [NEW] Free carbon-fibre weapon wrap for AK, Falcon, ACR, Launcher, Frenzy and Banana Gun
data.about_the_game:
Equip this to look totally snazzy + support the development costs of Paint Warfare!

Includes:
  • A huge banana costume + sunglasses (customisable w/ your own hats!)
  • Bunnings hat
  • Doubles XP (ranking) for everyone including you in your lobby
  • 2 supporter player tags— Heart (❤) & Tester (テスタ)
  • Unique gun stickers for the Snake/AK, Frenzy and Sniper

  • [NEW] Free carbon-fibre weapon wrap for AK, Falcon, ACR, Launcher, Frenzy and Banana Gun
data.short_description: Paint Warfare is the fastest, wildest and most adrenaline-packed multiplayer FPS you’ll ever experience. With wall climbing, grenade jumping and hyper-fast movement, you can explore virtually any point in the maps.
data.reviews:
“boutta somehow get this dlc twice”
Goose

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 64-bit, 2 GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 64-bit, 3 GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
